titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Minnie Fisher Cunningham: The McArthur-Smith Research Papers
titlestmt.author: Timothy Wyatt

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was encoded in EAD by Archon 3.21 from an SQL database source on August 11th, 2016.

titlepage.titleproper: Guide to Minnie Fisher Cunningham: The McArthur-Smith Research Papers 1914/1999

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Minnie Fisher Cunningham: The McArthur-Smith Research Papers

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries

did.abstract: This collection consists of the research materials of Drs. Judith McArthur and Harold Smith. Included are copies of materials held at other institutions as well as the authors’ notes. The collection is divided into six series: Minnie Fisher Cunningham, People, Conventions/Conferences, Organizations/Committees, Issues, and Photographic Material. All materials relate to Minnie and her various efforts across differing fields of interest. The bulk of the papers consist of correspondence between Minnie and individuals and organizations. The series is organized thematically and alphabetically.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Name:
controlaccess.corpname: League of Women Voters of Houston

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use:
userestrict.p: Special Collections owns the physical items in our collections, but copyright normally belongs to the creator of the materials or their heirs. The researcher has full responsibility for determining copyright status, locating copyright holders, and abiding by current copyright laws when publishing or displaying copies of Special Collections material in print or electronic form. For more information, consult the appropriate librarian.
Reproduction decisions will be made by Special Collections staff on a case-by-case basis. Patrons are responsible for obtaining permission to publish from copyright holders.

Note: A significant portion of the materials included in the collection are photocopies or reprints acquired from institutions other than the University of Houston and as such the holding institution must be cited where applicable.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: Minnie Fisher Cunningham: The McArthur-Smith Research Papers. Courtesy of Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials:
relatedmaterial.p: Minnie Fisher Cunningham Papers digital collection (http://digital.lib.uh.edu/collection/p15195coll33)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the research materials of Drs. Judith McArthur and Harold Smith. Included are copies of materials held at other institutions as well as the authors’ notes. The collection is divided into six series: Minnie Fisher Cunningham, People, Conventions/Conferences, Organizations/Committees, Issues, and Photographic Material. All materials relate to Minnie and her various efforts across differing fields of interest. The bulk of the papers consist of correspondence between Minnie and individuals and organizations. The series is organized thematically and alphabetically.

Note: A significant portion of the materials included in the collection are photocopies or reprints acquired from institutions other than the University of Houston and as such the holding institution must be cited where applicable.
